rdfs:label: dateTimeClass
dc:description: Date-times should conform to ISO8601 date-time format YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.000000Z (year, month, day, hour (24h), minute, second, optional fractional seconds, and optional UTC time indicator. Any variation on the full form is allowed.
owm:EquivalentTo: StandardValueClass and (allowedCharacter value "digits") and (allowedCharacter value "T") and (allowedCharacter value "hyphen") and (allowedCharacter value "colon")

rdfs:label: nameClass
dc:description: Value class designating values that have the characteristics of node names. The allowed characters are alphanumeric, hyphen, and underscore.
owm:EquivalentTo: StandardValueClass and (allowedCharacter value "letters") and (allowedCharacter value "digits") and (allowedCharacter value "underscore") and (allowedCharacter value "hyphen")

rdfs:label: numericClass
Attributes: allowedCharacter=digits, allowedCharacter=E, allowedCharacter=e, allowedCharacter=plus, allowedCharacter=hyphen, allowedCharacter=period
dc:description: Value must be a valid numerical value.
owm:EquivalentTo: StandardValueClass and (allowedCharacter value "digits") and (allowedCharacter value "E") and (allowedCharacter value "e") and (allowedCharacter value "plus") and (allowedCharacter value "hyphen") and (allowedCharacter value "period")

rdfs:label: posixPath
owm:EquivalentTo: StandardValueClass and (allowedCharacter value "digits") and (allowedCharacter value "letters") and (allowedCharacter value "slash") and (allowedCharacter value "colon")

rdfs:label: textClass
dc:description: Values that have the characteristics of text such as in descriptions. The text characters include printable characters (32 <= ASCII< 127) excluding comma, square bracket and curly braces as well as non ASCII (ASCII codes > 127).
